title: Mit manipal cse with Financial technology VS Pes cse with ai main campus.

comments.body: There is no main campus. There is rr campus and ec campus.
Aight sorry man. Rr campus I meant
Depends a lot mam I got cse manipal at manipal but my parents didn't allow me saying that the environment is not good, if you're parents say yes then go for and enjoy life
better placements, plus ai is better then fin tech, take pes if u dont care about college life too much.
Isn't rr campus the main campus?
Ec waale kehte hai "there is no main campus" rr waale kehte hai rr is the main campus, it's pests' way to make themselves feel better.
Manipal, with this branch specification pes might have a bit of slight edge, but college life would be alot better in MIT. But if you dont care much about college life then pes
Ikr I along with several of my friends were in the situation lol, but ended up with pes ( same reasons )
I'd say fintech > AI. Manipal peer group could also be better and friendlier. Both unis have their pros and cons, so pick the field you're interested in.
